price: Geniş zırhlar yap, dokumasını da sağlam tut, diye. Salih amellerde bulunun. Çünkü ben yapmakta olduğunuz amellerinizi görenim.
arabic: أَنِ ٱعۡمَلۡ سَٰبِغَٰتٖ وَقَدِّرۡ فِي ٱلسَّرۡدِۖ وَٱعۡمَلُواْ صَٰلِحًاۖ إِنِّي بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ani iʿ'mal sābighātin waqaddir fī al-sardi wa-iʿ'malū ṣāliḥan innī bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
